text:
For consistency sake with the Commandline cmdl member in
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ExecTask and also in order to allow subclasses
access to the Java commandline, the member CommandlineJava cmdl in
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java should be made protected (as opposed to private).
creator: gregor.heine@iona.com

text:
The CVS HEAD cut of the java task includes a getCommandLine() method for this
purpose.
creator: mbenson@apache.org
